message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd really find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $120 for it.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $120.  Would you consider $125?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I can only afford to pay $120 for the product.
